title: Ryokunohara Meikyuu
synopsis: Hiroki and Kanata have been together since they were children. One day Hiroki is caught up in an accident while trying to save a little girl. The next thing he knows, he is looking down on his own body. Seperated from his body, Kanata, and everything else, he tries to figure out just what is going on.
staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Kunimoto, Yoshihiro', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Music']], ['Kimura, Maki', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Iwataki, Satoshi', ['Key Animation']]]
